lfsom.experiment

Class treeSOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • lfsom.experiment.treeSOM

  • public class treeSOM
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads folders structure and generates an object which contains all nets information. It's needed for the client, to navegate trough the nets
    Version:
    $Id: $
    Author:
    vicente

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      treeSOM(java.lang.String dataPath)
      When inited, runs all folder structure and gets a list with all nets, containing information of fathers and cells
